price: Deɛ wͻka ne sε: “Ɛberε bεn na saa bͻhyε no bԑba, sε moyε nokwafoͻ ampa a?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
